content: [debuginfo-gdb+lldb] always fail on my machine on ./x.py test, presumably because I have wrong gdb/lldb installed. Is there something I can put into config.toml to always just skip those tests?
you can give arguments to ./x.py test to indicate which directories to test
but then you have to keep that list in sync with whatever the current default is
I don't know if there's a way to subtract from the default; it would be nice if there were an easy way to do that, I suppose.
You can simply do --exclude src/test/debuginfo for example
